mapper.sql: caigou.cg_id as caigou_cg_id, caigou.sqid as caigou_sqid, caigou.cg_time as caigou_cg_time, caigou.`state` as `caigou_state`, caigou.kejsr as caigou_kejsr, caigou.jsr as caigou_jsr, caigou.cjr as caigou_cjr, caigou.state_time as caigou_state_time, caigou.bz as caigou_bz
mapper.insert: insert into caigou (sqid, cg_time, `state`, kejsr, jsr, cjr, state_time, bz) values (#{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kejsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into caigou
sqid,
cg_time,
`state`,
kejsr,
jsr,
cjr,

bz,

mapper.update:
update caigou
sqid = #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cg_time = #{cg_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kejsr = #{kejsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jsr = #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cjr = #{cjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state_time = #{state_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cg_id = #{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update caigou set sqid = #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cg_time = #{cg_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kejsr = #{kejsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jsr = #{jsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjr = #{cjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state_time = #{state_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cg_id = #{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select c.cg_id caigou_cg_id,c.sqid caigou_sqid,c.cg_time caigou_cg_time,c.state `caigou_state`,c.kejsr caigou_kejsr,c.jsr caigou_jsr,c.cjr caigou_cjr,c.state_time caigou_state_time,c.bz caigou_bz from apprecords a inner join caigousq q on a.app_records_id=q.state_id inner join caigou c on c.sqid=q.sqid where a.app_state='已审批'
